rooms.description: Spacious entry area with a foyer and reception desk, integrating local materials like stone and wood.
A large open-plan living space that serves as both living room and dining area, adorned with Bohemian art and textiles.
A dedicated workspace with natural light and soundproofing, ideal for remote work or creative projects.
A serene study and reading room featuring built-in bookshelves and a cozy seating area.
A comfortable guest room with bohemian decor and ample storage.
The largest bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, designed for comfort and privacy.
Modern bathroom with dual vanities and a spa-like tub for relaxation.

openings.description: Large wooden door with decorative patterns, opening to a covered porch.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in living areas and master bedroom for ample natural light.
openings.location: Strategically placed throughout to adhere to Vastu principles

openings.description: A dedicated opening that leads from the home office area to a large garden space, designed as an extension of the living area.

garden.description: A large garden designed for relaxation and as a recreational space, incorporating local flora.

rooms.description: Bohemian style bedroom with ample storage and a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Additional bedroom with a modern bohemian design to accommodate guests or as an office.
A quiet area on the upper level for additional workspace or creative projects.

openings.description: Open balconies that provide access to the outdoor garden, aligning with Vastu principles for air flow.
Large windows providing natural light and a view of the surrounding landscape.
openings.location: Strategically placed to enhance energy flow

duplex_details.vastu_considerations: Rooms and openings positioned following Vastu norms for optimal energy flow
